attributes.action: don’t cancel GCSE and A-level Exams in 2021
attributes.additional_details: clearly it was a disaster last year why would we want a repeat of that?
attributes.background: So many people trying to cancel the exams not understand the damage it will do to others, please don’t let this happen

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Don’t cancel GCSES and A-Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554219
